Package com.aep.dao

Interface UserDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
UserDAOImpl
public interface UserDAO
UserDAO interface defines methods for interacting with the User table in the database. It provides CRUD operations and user authentication methods.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    authenticateUser(String username, String password)
    Authenticates a user by their username and password.
    void
    createUser(UserDTO user)
    Creates a new user in the database.
    UserDTO
    getUserByUsername(String username)
    Fetches a user from the database by their username.

  • Method Details

    • createUser

      void createUser(UserDTO user)
      Creates a new user in the database.
      Parameters:
      user - the UserDTO object representing the user to be added

    • getUserByUsername

      UserDTO getUserByUsername(String username)
      Fetches a user from the database by their username.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user to fetch
      Returns:
      a UserDTO object representing the fetched user, or null if no user is found

    • authenticateUser

      boolean authenticateUser(String username, String password)
      Authenticates a user by their username and password.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user
      password - the password of the user
      Returns:
      true if authentication is successful, false otherwise
